trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentName"></xref> class defines the name of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentName.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentName"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentName.#ctor(System.Byte[])"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentName"></xref> class by using the specified array of byte values as the encoded name of the content of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
An array of byte values that specifies the encoded name of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentName.#ctor(System.String)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentName"></xref> class by using the specified name for the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> object that specifies the name for the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentName> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object from which to copy information.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9DocumentName.DocumentName"></xref> property retrieves the document name.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> object that contains the document name.
